lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry turned an offensive rebound into a three-point play to highlight a 10-point, fourth-quarter spurt as the Golden State Warriors outlasted the Oklahoma City Thunder 121-106 to tie the all-time NBA record for consecutive home wins Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Beat Thunder, Tie Consecutive Home Wins Record
headline.main: Warriors Beat Thunder, Tie Consecutive Home Wins Record
